entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
